carskit.data.structure

Class SparseRCMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • carskit.data.structure.ContextualRatingMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<RCMatrixEntry>

    public class SparseRCMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<RCMatrixEntry>, java.io.Serializable
    Data Structure: Sparse Matrix whose implementation is modified from M4J library
    • Compressed Row Storage (CRS)
    • Compressed Col Storage (CCS)
    Author:
    Yong Zheng
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
